com.madrobot.di.xml.io

Class AbstractXppDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.madrobot.di.xml.io.AbstractDriver
      • com.madrobot.di.xml.io.AbstractXppDriver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HierarchicalStreamDriver
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    XppDriver

    public abstract class AbstractXppDriver
extends AbstractDriver
    An abstract base class for a driver using an XPP implementation.
    Since:
    1.4
